name: Real French Crepes
author: SAMMYSAM
summary: I am a French Canadian from Montreal, this recipe is one of the first ones that I learned as a child growing up and can either be served traditional style with REAL maple syrup on top or cold with ice cream rolled into it and chocolate syrup on top as a dessert.
directions: In a mixing bowl, combine flour, egg, and milk
Heat a large skillet or crepe pan over a medium-high heat
Spray the pan with non-stick cooking spray
Pour about 1/3 cup of batter into the pan, lift the pan and turn it by rotating your wrist, spreading a PAPER THIN amount in the pan
Flip the crepe when it starts to bubble
When it is finished cooking, remove it and repeat this process with the remaining batter
